Split PDF (Finder)
==================

Split PDFs into individual pages — directly from Finder.
No apps to learn. No files uploaded. Works entirely on your Mac.


INSTALLATION
------------

1. Drag "Split PDF (Finder).app" to your Applications folder

2. Double-click the app once to register the Finder service

3. Enable the service:
   - Open System Settings
   - Go to Keyboard > Keyboard Shortcuts > Services
   - Find "Split into Pages" under Files and Folders (scroll if needed)
   - Check the box to enable it


USAGE
-----

1. Right-click any PDF in Finder
2. Select "Split into Pages" from the menu
3. Done — individual pages appear in a new folder


OUTPUT
------

Your original PDF is never modified.

Split pages are saved in a folder named "{filename} Pages"
next to the original file.


REQUIREMENTS
------------

macOS 13.0 (Ventura) or later
